definition[0]: if a long statement, argument etc boils down to a single statement, that statement is the main point or cause
example[0]: It boils down to a question of priorities.
definition[1]: to make a list or piece of writing shorter by not including anything that is not necessary
example[1]: You can boil this down so that there are just two main categories.
definition[2]: if a food or liquid boils down, or if you boil it down, it becomes less after it is cooked
example[2]: Spinach tends to boil down a lot.
example[3]: glue made from boiling down old sheepskins
